root.sql: select 序号=Row_Number()over(partition by e.PERSON_ID order by e.PERSON_ID) , e.BANK_CARD 转入账号, e.PERSON_NAME 转入户名,PAY_VALUE 金额 from HR_EMPLOYEE e inner join ( select t.PERSON_ID,sum( t.PAY_VALUE) PAY_VALUE from HR_SALARY_PAY p inner join HR_SALARY_PAY_VALUE t on t.PAY_ID=p.PAY_ID where p.STATUS=2 and p.PAY_MONTH=@payMonth and t.ITEM_ID in (4,5,101,102,103,104,105,106,017,108,109,110,111) group by t.PERSON_ID ) v on v.PERSON_ID=e.PERSON_ID

select c.NAME 单位,e.PERSON_NAME 姓名,e.CARD_ID 身份证,e.PHONE 手机, vvv.* from ( select vv.PERSON_ID,sum(应发工资) 应发工资,sum(养老) 养老,sum(失业) 失业,sum(医疗) 医疗,sum(工伤) 工伤,sum(生育) 生育,sum(失业金) 失业金 from ( select v.PERSON_ID, case v.ITEM_ID when 0 then v.PAY_VALUE else 0 end 应发工资 , case v.ITEM_ID when 201 then v.PAY_VALUE else 0 end 养老 , case v.ITEM_ID when 202 then v.PAY_VALUE else 0 end 失业 , case v.ITEM_ID when 203 then v.PAY_VALUE else 0 end 医疗 , case v.ITEM_ID when 204 then v.PAY_VALUE else 0 end 工伤 , case v.ITEM_ID when 205 then v.PAY_VALUE else 0 end 生育 , case v.ITEM_ID when 206 then v.PAY_VALUE else 0 end 失业金 from ( -- 应发工资 select t.PERSON_ID,0 ITEM_ID,sum(t.pay_value) PAY_VALUE from HR_SALARY_PAY_VALUE t inner join HR_SALARY_PAY p on p.PAY_ID=t.PAY_ID where p.PAY_MONTH=@payMonth and t.ITEM_ID in (101,102,103,104,105,106,107,108,109,110,111) GROUP BY t.PERSON_ID union -- 个人保险 select t.PERSON_ID,t.ITEM_ID,sum(t.pay_value) PAY_VALUE from HR_SALARY_PAY_VALUE t inner join HR_SALARY_PAY p on p.PAY_ID=t.PAY_ID where p.PAY_MONTH=@payMonth and t.ITEM_ID in (201,202,203,204,205,206) GROUP BY t.PERSON_ID,t.ITEM_ID ) v ) vv group by vv.PERSON_ID ) vvv inner join HR_EMPLOYEE e on e.PERSON_ID=vvv.PERSON_ID inner join HR_COMPANY c on c.COMPANY_ID=e.COMPANY_ID
